author: dblevins
msg: The EJBInvocationHandler now uses the Client.request method for all EJB requests

author: dblevins
msg: New interfaces for Requests and Responses, plus a generic Client class that
performs requests and populates a response instance.

author: dblevins
msg: The EJBInvocationHandler now uses the ConnectionManager for getting connections

author: dblevins
msg: The beginning of a connectin factory abstraction.  The existing connection
logic has been ported over to the abstraction, will try and move John M's
connection pooling logic over in the next few days.
I still need to update EJBInvocationHandler to use the ConnectionManager, that

author: dblevins
msg: The config factory will select the right default proxy factory for you if you
leave the <ProxyFactory> element out of your openejb.conf file.
